Name: Zhivago Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of float dehydrated apple slice.
Review: Sweet and sour - sweet apple, vanilla and bourbon balanced by sour lime juice.
History: Created in 2002 by Alex Kammerling, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Zhivago Cocktail contains 243 calories
